timeline.message:
Better detection of TV devices

Some devices were not detected as TV even though they are
Fix crash on Android 4.4 and surely other sdk versions
store isTv value to prevent calculating it again and again

timeline.bodyText: Please use the primitive type boolean
timeline.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText:
No??
How do you know if it's the first time you are checking isTv() and therefore you have to do all the calculations?
With object it's simple, unitialized == null and false == false, but with primitive uninitialized == false, so your are not sure whether false == uninitalized or false.
I don't see any other proper way to achieve #3483 (comment) than using Boolean object and its null value, but you tell me.

replies.bodyText: Oh, you're right, I forgot about that
